entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this evening then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and overnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 04 February 2023
